FuncDef: The display system tcam service brief command displays the group index and rule count occupied by different services. The display system tcam service brief command displays the group index and rule count occupied by different services.
CLIs: display system tcam service { cpcarslot <slot-id> | <service-name> slot <slot-id> [ chip <chip-id> ] }
display system tcam service brief [ slot <slot-id> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a slot ID.
The value is an integer. You can enter the question mark (?) and select the value as prompted.

Indicates the service type.
For the CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S:The options are as follows:
app-sessionauto-defendauto-defend-v6auto-port-defendbpdu-denybriefcapture-packetcpcardynamic-ctl-pkterps-globalerps-vlanhard-zoninghard-zoning-denyicmpv6-ping-detectin-portioam-encap-v4ioam-encap-v6nac-base-authnetworkccnull-macou-portout-portpa-bfd-mcpfc-hook-flowping-detectport-arp-limitqos-group-siptrans-vlan-iptrans-vlan-mactrans-vlan-preiptrans-vlan-protocolmlag-arpmlag-ndifit-staticifit-dynifit-cfgifit-dyn-egressifit-cfg-egress

Specifies a chip ID.
The value is an integer. It must be the ID of an available chip.

Displays the group index and rule count occupied by different services.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display system tcam service cpcar slot 1
<HUAWEI> display system tcam service brief slot 1
ExtraInfo: You can run this command to view detailed information about a specified service, including service priority, matched packet statistics, and delivered TCAM entries on chips.
